exp.title: My Experience
exp.desc: I design interactive experiences blending mixed reality, serious games, and immersive interfaces. With 6+ years building educational, scientific, and scenographic tools, I turn complex ideas into accessible, engaging solutions.

passions.title: My Passions
passions.desc_1: A former competitive ice hockey player, I still play for fun-with the same team spirit and rigor I bring to my professional projects.
passions.desc_2: I enjoy competitive games like Rocket League and sports sims such as hockey or football. Beyond entertainment, they sharpen my reflexes, focus, and teamwork-skills I apply to software development.
passions.desc_3: I'm always curious about new tech-VR, 3D, additive manufacturing. I love testing and pushing the limits of these tools with the same creativity and rigor as my projects. That passion fuels my research and keeps me ahead.
